ruleset.name: Basic Velocity
ruleset.description: The Basic Velocity ruleset contains basic rules for Apache Velocity pages.

rule.name: AvoidDeeplyNestedIfStmts
rule.message: Deeply nested if..then statements are hard to read
rule.description: Avoid creating deeply nested if-then statements since they are harder to read and error-prone to maintain.

rule.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
rule.message: These nested if statements could be combined
rule.description: Sometimes two consecutive 'if' statements can be consolidated by separating their conditions with a boolean short-circuit operator.

rule.name: ExcessiveTemplateLength
rule.description: The template is too long. It should be broken up into smaller pieces.

rule.name: AvoidReassigningParameters
rule.message: Avoid reassigning macro parameters such as ''{0}''
rule.description: Reassigning values to incoming parameters is not recommended. Use temporary local variables instead.

rule.name: EmptyIfStmt
rule.description: Empty if statements should be deleted.

rule.name: EmptyForeachStmt
rule.description: Empty foreach statements should be deleted.

rule.name: UnusedMacroParameter
rule.message: Avoid unused macro parameters such as ''{0}''
rule.description: Avoid unused macro parameters. They should be deleted.

rule.name: NoInlineJavaScript
rule.description: Avoid inline JavaScript. Import .js files instead.

rule.name: NoInlineStyles
rule.description: Avoid inline styles. Use css classes instead.
